meanings.definition: The amount that a cap can hold.
meanings.sent1: I poured two capfuls of water into the plant.
meanings.sent2: She added three capfuls of sugar to the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The tiny capfuls of medicine made the child giggle.
meanings.sent4: His laughter bubbled up like capfuls of joy.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering lake reflected the sky in capfuls of blue.

meanings.sent1: The recipe called for four capfuls of vanilla extract.
meanings.sent2: They collected many capfuls of seashells on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The capfuls of coins spilled out of the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed freely like capfuls of memories.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with capfuls of colorful flowers.
